summary.span: 代表可用名稱或索引存取的節點集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of nodes that can be accessed by name or index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlNamedNodeMap` 會傳回下列三個屬性。`XmlNamedNodeMap` is returned by the following three properties. - -傳回，類別繼承自`XmlNamedNodeMap`。 - Returns , a class which inherits from `XmlNamedNodeMap`. - -傳回`XmlNamedNodeMap`包含物件。 - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing objects. `XmlNamedNodeMap` 是唯讀的。The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only. - -傳回`XmlNamedNodeMap`包含物件。 - Returns an `XmlNamedNodeMap` containing objects. `XmlNamedNodeMap` 是唯讀的。The `XmlNamedNodeMap` is read-only.
